p: Protein content in maize grain (%) was estimated by multiplying nitrogen content by 6.25 [ 25]. Oil content (%) in maize grain was determined by taking grain samples (100 g) from the harvest of each plot. The grains were ground and taken together with solvent (Hexane) washings to a Soxhlet apparatus for extraction of oil at 60Â°C for about 12 hours [ 26]. The hexane dissolved in extracted maize oil was then evaporated using a rotary vacuum and boiling water bath, and the oil percentage was determined after a constant weight was obtained.
